fields.name: Salve
fields.description: Specifically designed to be used with your retinoid.
fields.ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearic Acid, Bisabolol, Stearyl Alcohol, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Opuntia Ficus-Indica (Napol Cactus) Extract, Sacchara- myces Cerevisiae Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Biosaccharide Gum-1, Allantoin, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Hydrogenated Soy Polyglycerides, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethiconol, Panthenol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Disodium EDTA, Carbomer, C15-23 Alkane, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol
fields.benefits:
• High purity extract specifically developed for combating sensitivity from AHA and retinoids.
• Regulates inflammation enzymes to soothe the skin.
• Decreases trans-epidermal water loss by 17%.
• Increases skin moisture by 150% after 24 hours and by 95% after four weeks.
fields.ingredients_highlight: Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Opuntia Ficus-Indica (Napol Cactus) Extract, Saccharamyces Cerevisiae Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Allantoin, Phytosphingosine.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a generous amount to skin as needed. Allow to absorb before applying additional products. Can be used twice per day or as needed.
fields.forever_five_reasons: Send your face to the spa. Our healing Salve is specifically designed to dial back sensitivity from retinoids, AHA, or harsh environments by moisturizing and soothing your skin. Expect less sensitivity, reduced redness, deep hydration, and soothed skin.

fields.name: Glowgetter
fields.description:
Bonus ingredient: Hyaluronic Acid to draw in moisture.
Enjoy the ease of a doctor's consult online.
fields.ingredients: Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Polysilicone-11, C30-45 Alkyl Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-16 Macadamia Glycerides, Dimethicone, Oenocarpus Bataua Fruit Oil, Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil, Phosphatidylcholine, Tocopheryl Acetate, BHT
fields.benefits: Retinoids are proven to prevent and treat wrinkles, pigmentation, uneven skin tone, enlarged pores, and acne.
fields.ingredients_highlight: Products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, mineral oil-free, and vegan. Hyaluronic Acid, Tretinoin (depending on your skin profile evaluation, Tretinoin strengths range from 0.015% to 0.1%).
fields.how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount of your retinoid serum onto your forehead, cheeks, and chin at nighttime. More detailed instructions will be included in your order.

fields.name: Liquid Cloak
fields.product_summary: Vitamin C & E + Ferulic Acid Serum
fields.description:
Dermatologist tested
Cruelty free, paraben free, fragrance free, alcohol free, non-comedogenic
Sustainable & refillable glass bottle with airless mechanism for zero oxidation & maximum stability
fields.ingredients: Water (Aqua), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Propanediol, Ferulic Acid, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Potassium Hydroxide, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Phenylalanine
fields.benefits:
PROTECTS & RESTORES SKIN: Vitamin C is a superstar antioxidant that protects and restores your skin. Besides its antioxidative property, vitamin C is photoprotective, anti-pigmentary, anti-inflammatory, and aids collagen synthesis.
EFFECTIVELY PREVENTS & TREATS PHOTOAGING: Not all vitamin C formulas are created equal–this formula contains ferulic acid & vitamin E antioxidants to maximize stability and double its photoprotective qualities.
 SUSTAINABLE REFILLABLE GLASS BOTTLE: Vitamin C can be highly unstable–this bottle features an airless tube mechanism for zero oxidation and maximum stability. The glass bottle is reusable.
COMBINES PROVEN SCIENCE WITH OUR COMMUNITY’S VALUES: Formulated with board-certified dermatologists and our community, Liquid Cloak has also gone through extensive testing to earn its official "dermatologist tested" claim. As always, all Dear Brightly products are cruelty, paraben, fragrance, and alcohol free.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• 15% L-ASCORBIC ACID: A potent level of the chemically active form of vitamin C
• VITAMIN E + FERULIC ACID: Antioxidants that complement vitamin C, making it more stable and doubling its photoprotective qualities
• AMINO ACIDS: The building blocks of all proteins, like collagen and elastin
fields.how_to_use: After cleansing, gently press 1-3 pumps onto your face, neck, and chest to protect your skin from everyday pollutants and leave your complexion glowing and smooth. Use daily in the morning and follow with moisturizer and SPF. Refill instructions: 1) Keep the glass bottle, pump, and lid. 2. Recycle inner bottle. 3. Replace with refill.
fields.forever_five_reasons:
Vitamin C is one of the most studied antioxidants for skin out there and the most abundant antioxidant in human skin, but we can’t synthesize it on our own. As our skin encounters oxidative stress daily, which can lead to premature skin aging, applying vitamin C can boost our skin’s natural cell-protecting abilities.
Vitamin C and retinoids are powerful skincare ingredients to fight photoaging, hyperpigmentation, and premature collagen degradation. This effective pair is part of your base for healthier skin, though each is better suited to a different time of day. Vitamin C is best used in the morning, while retinoid is for your nighttime skincare routine.

fields.name: NeverSkip Tinted
fields.description:
Dermatologist tested, cruelty free, paraben free, phthalate free, alcohol free, no fragrance added
Hypoallergenic & non-irritating; well suited for sensitive skin
Tinted to prevent white cast & for even blending
fields.ingredients: Active ingredient: Zinc Oxide 10%. Other ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides
fields.benefits:
• TINTED TO PREVENT WHITE CAST & FOR EVEN BLENDING: Mineral sunscreens can leave a white cast, but NeverSkip is tinted to evenly blend upon application and to prevent leaving any white cast on any skin tone.
• HYPOALLERGENIC & NON-IRRITATING: Protect without the stress. NeverSkip is well suited for sensitive skin and unlikely to irritate or cause allergic reactions.
• 100% MINERAL BROAD SPECTRUM: The active ingredient, zinc oxide, not only protects against UVB rays, but it’s one of the few active ingredients out there that blocks longer wavelengths of UVA rays.
• DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED, MARINE & REEF SAFE, & FREE OF: Cruelty free, paraben free, alcohol free, and no fragrance added.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• ZINC OXIDE: Not only protective against UVB rays, but it’s one of the few active ingredients out there that blocks longer wavelengths of UVA rays.
• TRIGLYCERIDES: Also antioxidants, triglycerides are fatty acids that nourish and replenish your skin’s appearance, ultimately helping to smooth skin.
• VITAMIN E ANTIOXIDANT: Beyond the capabilities of sunscreen to reduce free radical formation, an antioxidant like vitamin E can reduce it even more.
fields.forever_five_reasons:
The Derma Five is a skincare routine developed by dermatologists and inspired by our community’s values. The result is a skincare system that enhances optimal skin health and is an experience made for you.
All in the name, if it’s one thing you do to prevent skin cancer and photoaging (premature skin aging due to damage from repeated sun exposure), dermatologists recommend that you never skip your SPF 30+ sunscreen, which blocks 97% of the sun’s UVB rays. Specifically, while both UVB and UVA rays contribute to skin cancer, UVB rays primarily cause sunburns while UVA rays cause premature skin aging in the form of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun spots.
NeverSkip is a 100% mineral sunscreen with the active ingredient zinc oxide and blocks both UVB and UVA rays. UVB and UVA rays can penetrate through clouds, but UVA rays have a longer wavelength that can penetrate windows; zinc oxide is one of the few ingredients out there that blocks both.

fields.name: Skinship
fields.product_summary: Moisturizer Rich w/ Ceramides + Hyaluronic Acid
fields.description:
Dermatologist tested, cruelty free, paraben free, hypoallergenic, non-irritating, phthalate free, alcohol free, no fragrance added
Specially designed to be used with retinoids, exfoliators (e.g., AHA/BHA), & in harsh, dry environments
Sustainable & refillable glass bottle with airless mechanism–for minimum oxidation & maximum stability
fields.ingredients: Water (Aqua), Ethyl Macadamiate, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Avena Sativa Kernel Flour, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Seed Oil, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NS, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Cholesterol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glyceryl Stearate, Sucrose
fields.benefits:
• SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR RETINOID USE: Skinship is specially designed to complement retinoids, exfoliators, and skin in harsh, dry environments.
• HYDRATES & HELPS TREATMENTS SET IN TO THE SKIN: Developed with five ceramides and hyaluronic acid, Skinship helps effectively strengthen the skin barrier while preparing it to handle treatments like retinoids better.
• SUSTAINABLE REFILLABLE GLASS BOTTLE: To maintain the integrity of Skinship, our glass bottle features an airless tube mechanism for minimal oxidation and maximum stability. The glass bottle is reusable.
• DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED & FREE OF: Cruelty free, paraben free, hypoallergenic, non-irritating, phthalate free, alcohol free, and no fragrance added.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• HYALURONIC ACID: Increases skin hydration, for comfortably moisturized skin, all day and all night long.
• CERAMIDE RICH: Perfect partners to hyaluronic acid, ceramides create the protective layer that limits moisture loss and fights against everyday environmental stressors.
• POLYGONUM AVICULARE EXTRACT: A rich plant extract that has photoprotective properties against UV and infrared damage.
fields.forever_five_reasons:
The Derma Five is a skincare routine developed by dermatologists and inspired by our community’s values. The result is a skincare system that enhances optimal skin health and is an experience made for you.
With regards to skin aging, our skin over time produces less collagen, hyaluronic acid, and fatty acids like ceramides in the form of fine lines and drier, duller, and rougher skin. The bad news–it can feel more uncomfortable.
The good news–Skinship is formulated with hyaluronic acid and is rich with ceramides. Both ingredients increase skin hydration and will help to maintain your skin’s integrity so that you can literally feel more comfortable in your own skin. But it doesn’t stop there. Skinship allows your skin to also better handle treatments like retinoids, another member of the Derma Five family.

fields.ingredients: Base: Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Polysilicone-11, C30-45 Alkyl Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-16 Macadamia Glycerides, Dimethicone, Oenocarpus Bataua Fruit Oil, Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil, Phosphatidylcholine, Tocopheryl Acetate, BHT; Salve: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearic Acid, Bisabolol, Stearyl Alcohol, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Opuntia Ficus-Indica (Napol Cactus) Extract, Sacchara- myces Cerevisiae Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Biosaccharide Gum-1, Allantoin, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Hydrogenated Soy Polyglycerides, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethiconol, Panthenol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Disodium EDTA, Carbomer, C15-23 Alkane, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol
fields.benefits: Retinoids are proven to prevent and treat wrinkles, pigmentation, uneven skin tone, enlarged pores, and acne.
fields.ingredients_highlight: Products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, mineral oil-free, and vegan. Hyaluronic Acid, Tretinoin (depending on your skin profile evaluation, Tretinoin strengths range from 0.015% to 0.1%).
fields.how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount of your retinoid serum onto your forehead, cheeks, and chin at nighttime. More detailed instructions will be included in your order.

fields.name: Liquid Cloak
fields.product_summary: Vitamin C & E + Ferulic Acid Serum
fields.description:
Dermatologist tested
Cruelty free, paraben free, fragrance free, alcohol free, non-comedogenic
Sustainable & refillable glass bottle with airless mechanism for zero oxidation & maximum stability
fields.ingredients: Water (Aqua), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Propanediol, Ferulic Acid, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Potassium Hydroxide, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Phenylalanine
fields.benefits:
PROTECTS & RESTORES SKIN: Vitamin C is a superstar antioxidant that protects and restores your skin. Besides its antioxidative property, vitamin C is photoprotective, anti-pigmentary, anti-inflammatory, and aids collagen synthesis.
EFFECTIVELY PREVENTS & TREATS PHOTOAGING: Not all vitamin C formulas are created equal–this formula contains ferulic acid & vitamin E antioxidants to maximize stability and double its photoprotective qualities.
 SUSTAINABLE REFILLABLE GLASS BOTTLE: Vitamin C can be highly unstable–this bottle features an airless tube mechanism for zero oxidation and maximum stability. The glass bottle is reusable.
COMBINES PROVEN SCIENCE WITH OUR COMMUNITY’S VALUES: Formulated with board-certified dermatologists and our community, Liquid Cloak has also gone through extensive testing to earn its official "dermatologist tested" claim. As always, all Dear Brightly products are cruelty, paraben, fragrance, and alcohol free.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• 15% L-ASCORBIC ACID: A potent level of the chemically active form of vitamin C
• VITAMIN E + FERULIC ACID: Antioxidants that complement vitamin C, making it more stable and doubling its photoprotective qualities
• AMINO ACIDS: The building blocks of all proteins, like collagen and elastin
fields.how_to_use: After cleansing, gently press 1-3 pumps onto your face, neck, and chest to protect your skin from everyday pollutants and leave your complexion glowing and smooth. Use daily in the morning and follow with moisturizer and SPF. Refill instructions: 1) Keep the glass bottle, pump, and lid. 2. Recycle inner bottle. 3. Replace with refill.
fields.forever_five_reasons:
Vitamin C is one of the most studied antioxidants for skin out there and the most abundant antioxidant in human skin, but we can’t synthesize it on our own. As our skin encounters oxidative stress daily, which can lead to premature skin aging, applying vitamin C can boost our skin’s natural cell-protecting abilities.
Vitamin C and retinoids are powerful skincare ingredients to fight photoaging, hyperpigmentation, and premature collagen degradation. This effective pair is part of your base for healthier skin, though each is better suited to a different time of day. Vitamin C is best used in the morning, while retinoid is for your nighttime skincare routine.

fields.name: Skinship
fields.product_summary: Moisturizer Rich w/ Ceramides + Hyaluronic Acid
fields.description:
Dermatologist tested, cruelty free, paraben free, hypoallergenic, non-irritating, phthalate free, alcohol free, no fragrance added
Specially designed to be used with retinoids, exfoliators (e.g., AHA/BHA), & in harsh, dry environments
Sustainable & refillable glass bottle with airless mechanism–for minimum oxidation & maximum stability
fields.ingredients: Water (Aqua), Ethyl Macadamiate, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Avena Sativa Kernel Flour, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Seed Oil, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NS, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Cholesterol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glyceryl Stearate, Sucrose
fields.benefits:
• SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR RETINOID USE: Skinship is specially designed to complement retinoids, exfoliators, and skin in harsh, dry environments.
• HYDRATES & HELPS TREATMENTS SET IN TO THE SKIN: Developed with five ceramides and hyaluronic acid, Skinship helps effectively strengthen the skin barrier while preparing it to handle treatments like retinoids better.
• SUSTAINABLE REFILLABLE GLASS BOTTLE: To maintain the integrity of Skinship, our glass bottle features an airless tube mechanism for minimal oxidation and maximum stability. The glass bottle is reusable.
• DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED & FREE OF: Cruelty free, paraben free, hypoallergenic, non-irritating, phthalate free, alcohol free, and no fragrance added.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• HYALURONIC ACID: Increases skin hydration, for comfortably moisturized skin, all day and all night long.
• CERAMIDE RICH: Perfect partners to hyaluronic acid, ceramides create the protective layer that limits moisture loss and fights against everyday environmental stressors.
• POLYGONUM AVICULARE EXTRACT: A rich plant extract that has photoprotective properties against UV and infrared damage.
fields.forever_five_reasons:
The Derma Five is a skincare routine developed by dermatologists and inspired by our community’s values. The result is a skincare system that enhances optimal skin health and is an experience made for you.
With regards to skin aging, our skin over time produces less collagen, hyaluronic acid, and fatty acids like ceramides in the form of fine lines and drier, duller, and rougher skin. The bad news–it can feel more uncomfortable.
The good news–Skinship is formulated with hyaluronic acid and is rich with ceramides. Both ingredients increase skin hydration and will help to maintain your skin’s integrity so that you can literally feel more comfortable in your own skin. But it doesn’t stop there. Skinship allows your skin to also better handle treatments like retinoids, another member of the Derma Five family.

fields.name: Milk Tower
fields.description:
Removes daily impurities like pollution and makeup
Has moisturizing and soothing properties
Sustainable and refillable silicone bottle
Dermatologist tested, cruelty free, paraben free, no fragrance added, non-irritating, phthalate free, and alcohol free
fields.benefits:
• GENTLE CLEANSING: Our skin is naturally acidic at around a pH of 5, and anything above a 6 can be damaging to it. Sometimes cleansers don’t divulge their pH, but it’s important to know to preserve your skin’s pH level. Milk Tower’s pH is 5.
• REMOVES IMPURITIES & MAKEUP: Water alone won’t successfully cleanse. Surfactants are necessary to help grime dissolve with water, but they have the potential to damage the skin. Milk Tower only uses mild, coconut-derived surfactants that will effectively but gently cleanse.
• HYDRATING, NOT OVERSTRIPPING: Milk Tower is made with Niacinamide, Green Tea Extract, and Boswellia Serrata Extract to moisturize, soothe, and calm.
• DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED & FREE OF: Cruelty free, paraben free, alcohol free, and no fragrance added.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• SODIUM LAUROYAL METHYL ISETHIONATE & COCO-GLUCOSIDE: Environmentally–friendly and coconut–derived, these are very safe, non–irritating, mild surfactants (cleansing agents) that are very effective at dissolving impurities with water but still gentle for skin.
• PH 5: Our skin is naturally acidic at a low pH of 5. Anything above a 6 can be damaging to the skin and make it harder for our skin to repair itself. Milk Tower has a pH of 5. 
• NIACINAMIDE, BOSWELLIA SERRATA EXTRACT, & GREEN TEA EXTRACT: In addition to a proper cleanse, these ingredients add extra benefits like moisturizing, soothing, and calming the skin.
fields.ingredients: Water, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Leaf/Stalk Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, Boswellia Serrata (Indian Frankincense) Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pyridoxine HCl, Silica, Glycerin, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glycol Distearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Coco-Glucoside, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glyceryl Oleate, Glyceryl Stearate, Citric Acid, Niacinamide, Sodium Starch, Octenylsuccinate, Maltodextrin, Calcium Pantothenate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate
fields.forever_five_reasons:
The Derma Five is a skincare routine developed by dermatologists and inspired by our community’s values. The result is a skincare system that enhances optimal skin health and is an experience made for you.
Every day, our face comes into contact with a lot (e.g., the sun, pollution, and makeup). Since water can’t wash off all of these alone, enter Milk Tower. Cleansing not only removes impurities and gets your skin ready for the next step in your skincare routine, but it also helps to prevent premature skin aging.
Keep in mind, it’s important to use a cleanser that won’t compromise the integrity of your skin while removing daily impurities. It can be challenging to achieve both well, but Milk Tower is made with mild surfactants to gently cleanse, has a pH of 5 (our skin has a pH of 5 and anything above 6 can be harmful), and includes moisturizing ingredients like Niacinamide to not overstrip but soothe. Note: If your skin tends to be dry, derms recommend nighttime use only followed by Skinship moisturizer.

fields.name: Night Shift
fields.description:
Bonus ingredient: Niacinamide, an anti-inflammatory healing compound that calms redness and boosts hydration.
Enjoy the ease of a doctor's consult online.
fields.ingredients: Base: ST-Elastomer 10, Q7-9120 Silicone Fluid, EL-7040 Hydro Elastomer Blend, Vitamin E Acetate, Liquid, Polyglycerol-3 Diisostearique
fields.benefits: Retinoids are proven to prevent and treat wrinkles, pigmentation, uneven skin tone, enlarged pores, and acne. Niacinamide is an anti-inflammatory healing compound that calms redness, reduces the appearance of big pores, prevents moisture loss and dehydration, and brightens the skin.
fields.ingredients_highlight:
• Tretinoin: Depending on your skin profile evaluation, Tretinoin strengths range from 0.015% to 0.1%.
• Niacinamide: An anti-inflammatory healing compound that calms redness and boosts hydration
fields.how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount of your retinoid serum onto your forehead, cheeks, and chin at nighttime. More detailed instructions will be included in your order.
